title: Russia's Putin lashes out at the U.S. and claims victory over sanctions
content:
1. Russia's Putin lashes out at the U.S. and claims victory over sanctions  NPR
  2. Putin lambasts the West and declares the end of 'the era of the unipolar world'  CNN
  3. President Putin criticises 'mad' Russia sanctions - BBC News  BBC News
  4. Russia’s Putin lashes out over Western sanctions ‘blitzkrieg,’ claims Ukraine invasion was forced  CNBC
  5. Putin speech delayed by 'massive' cyberattacks, according to Kremlin  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: ロシアのプーチン大統領は米国を非難し、制裁に対する勝利を主張する
